mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(A.ARTNO_ID,'') AS artnoId, IFNULL(A.SL_CODE,'') AS slCode, IFNULL(A.SL_PD_ARTNO,'') AS slPdArtNo, IFNULL(A.SL_CODE_DIS,'') AS slCodeDis, IFNULL(A.CLASSES_CODE,'') AS classesCode, IFNULL(A.MACHINING_CODE,'') AS machiningCode, IFNULL(A.BREED_CODE,'') AS breedCode, IFNULL(A.FEATURE_CODE,'') AS featureCode, IFNULL(A.WEIGHT_CODE,'') AS weightCode, IFNULL(A.NORMS_CODE, '') AS normsCode, IFNULL(A.GRADE_CODE, '') AS gradeCode, IFNULL(A.SALE_PLATFORM, '') AS salePlatform, IFNULL(A.BRAND_EP_ID, '') AS brandEpId, IFNULL(A.BRAND_ID, '') AS brandId, IFNULL(A.MANUFACTURE_CODE, '') AS manufactureCode, IFNULL(A.FACTORY_CODE, '') AS factoryCode, IFNULL(A.SALE_REGION_CODE, '') AS saleRegionCode, IFNULL(A.SALE_STATUS, '') AS saleStatus, IFNULL(A.PD_COUNTRY, '') AS pdCountry, IFNULL(A.PD_PLACE, '') AS pdPlace, IFNULL(A.PD_STANDARD, '') AS pdStandard, IFNULL(A.PD_INGREDIENT, '') AS pdIngredient, IFNULL(A.FOOD_LICENSE, '') AS foodLicense, IFNULL(A.SHELF_LIFE, '') AS shelfLife, IFNULL(A.STORAGE_CONDITION, '') AS storageCondition, IFNULL(A.NORMS_SPECIFICATION, '') AS normsSpecification FROM sl_pd_artno AS A WHERE A.SL_CODE=#{filterMap.slCode} AND A.SL_PD_ARTNO=#{filterMap.slPdArtNo}
